headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://assets.calendly.com https://calendly.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://assets.calendly.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://calendly.com https://assets.calendly.com; frame-src https://calendly.com https://www.google.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; object-src 'none'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
